    • getRandomActivityFor

      public Activity getRandomActivityFor(Creature creature) throws NoValidActivitiesException
      Retrieves a random activity suitable for the given creature from the room's list of activities.
      Specified by:
      getRandomActivityFor in interface RandomActivityFinderComposite
      Parameters:
      creature - The creature for which to select a random activity.
      Returns:
      A randomly selected Activity instance.
      Throws:
      NoValidActivitiesException - if there are no valid activities for the specified creature in the room.
